name: Out of the Park Baseball 20
summary: Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB and the MLBPA, OOTP 20 is a baseball & strategy gaming fan's dream come true and the only game ever to win the Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE. Out of the Park Baseball 20 - Twenty Years of Excellence!
info:
• 中文名: 劲爆美国棒球20
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019年3月22日
  • 开发: Out of the Park Developments
  • 发行: Out of the Park Developments
